trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for arguments for events dealing with a change in input language.
trans-unit.target: Udostępnia klasę podstawową dla argumentów dla zdarzeń dotyczących zmian w języka.

trans-unit.source: This class provides the base for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangedEventArgs> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangingEventArgs> classes, which in turn provide arguments for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguageChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguageChanging> routed events, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Ta klasa udostępnia podstawowe dla <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangedEventArgs>i <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangingEventArgs>klasy, które z kolei podać argumenty dla <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguageChanged>i <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguageChanging>odpowiednio kierowane zdarzenia.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguageChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguageChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangingEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Initializes base class values for a new instance of a deriving class.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje wartości klasy nowe wystąpienie klasy klasach pochodnych.

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageEventArgs> should call this constructor to ensure that values provided by the abstract base class are initialized properly.
trans-unit.target: Klasy, które pochodzą z <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageEventArgs>powinny wywoływać ten konstruktor, aby upewnić się, poprawnie zainicjowane wartości abstrakcyjna klasa podstawowa.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The constructors for <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangedEventArgs> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangingEventArgs> automatically call this base constructor.
A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object representing a new current input language.
A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object representing the previous current input language.
Gets a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object representing the new current input language.
The value of this property is established through the `newLanguageId` parameter provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Wartość tej właściwości zostanie nawiązane za pośrednictwem `newLanguageId` dostarczonych przez parametr <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>konstruktora.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object representing the new current input language.
Gets a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object representing the previous current input language.
The value of this property is established through the `previousLanguageId` parameter provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Wartość tej właściwości zostanie nawiązane za pośrednictwem `previousLanguageId` dostarczonych przez parametr <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>konstruktora.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object representing the previous current input language.
